item.title: Mortality, emissions, global warming: energy type point of view
item.description: Materials: You can find all the resources of this article in the following link: https://github.com/kpaulsen97/projectB Introduction Energy: it’s the base of everything. If we didn’t have available energy our cars wouldn’t work, our industries neither, we wouldn’t have water in our houses, warmth in the winter and the list goes on. But everything has a cost, especially if it is this great: the planet is suffering. And doesn’t matter if we can order sushi from our smartphones whenever we want if we don’t have a planet to eat sushi on.
